data.name: Alien Life Lab
data.detailed_description:
The ship payment is due...
But you've found the perfect job to pay off your precious (and only) spacecraft.
A wildlife outbreak on Alien Life Lab has plunged the station into chaos and there may be an epizootic crisis onboard.

Wrangle loose beasties on the Alien Life Lab Space Station using your stun pistol, stun shotgun and bio-sword to pay off your ship.

*Photosensitive Epilepsy Warning: Flashing Lights and Images. Use caution if you are sensitive to these aspects.




Tranquilize hostile aliens with 3 Different Weapons: Sci Fi Pistol, Shotgun and Sword
Physics based bullets and gimmicks
Sci-Fi Creatures and Robots
XBox Game Pad Friendly

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers.

movies.name: Alien Life Lab || Early Access || July 2022

content_descriptors.notes: There is some Gore, Violence, Blood, Death, Violent Language, Dissection, Nudity and Drug Use in both Sci-Fi and Realistic scenes.
